content: A reminder of the inaugural FSH conference call tomorrow (Thursday) at 9 am Eastern US Time. Information:https://meet.mitre.org/mkramer/K383VJGC or dial in at (781) 271-2020 #7277283 (we will not be using the HL7 dial in number)

@Rick Geimer @Ward Weistra the FHIR Shorthand samples we discussed this morning are now up on this repository: https://github.com/HL7/fhir-shorthand/tree/master/samples. Potentially you could"dry lab" some of your profiles in this syntax, and see if there are gaps or improvements. Thanks for being on the call this morning!
9am eastern is not a happy time for me....
It's hard. we have Europe and Seattle and Boston...
How about 3PM ET. It would 12PM PT, 8PM @ GB, 9PM @ EU, and 6AM @ AU
That would work, but on a different day of week because of a conflicting call

Thanks for posting, Mark.
I understand the timezone dilemma, but will rarely be able to attend evening calls...
